keyQuestions.question: In the past 12 months have you purchased a surf clothing product from the following type of outlet: (select one per outlet types)
keyQuestions.subQuestion: Multi brand (sells a variety of brands) retail shop (eg. store at a mall or in a shopping strip such as Surf Dive nâ€™ Ski, Ozmosis, your local surf shop)
Easy access (eg. free shipping online, stocked in local store)

keyQuestions.question: Have you ever chosen a surf clothing product specifically because of its sustainability (such as organic, Fairtrade, recycled) attributes?
When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you right now in deciding which one to purchase?(select one per aspect)
keyQuestions.subQuestion: includes Organic materials (eg. cotton grown without pesticides to minimise environmental impacts)
includes Fairtrade materials (eg. cotton sourced from producers in developing countries and certified to provide enhanced workplace, social and environmental outcomes)
includes Recycled materials (eg. polyester made from re-used plastic)

keyQuestions.question: If there are any other sustainability aspects that you consider when purchasing surf clothing please say what they are:

Five years from now, how important do you think sustainability aspects (organic, Fairtrade, recycled, cruelty free, petroleum free) will be in your decision making about which surf brand to purchase:(select one)
Please indicate your agreement with the following statements: (select one per statement)
keyQuestions.subQuestion: I think that the brands in the surf industry currently have a strong focus on being sustainable
